mapper.select: SELECT s.SH_ID, SH_NAME, SH_ADDR, MENU, induty_code_se_name, SH_RCMN, SH_LIKE, SH_PHOTO, MIN(PRICE) AS PRICE FROM store s join store_menu m on s.SH_ID = m.SH_ID group by s.SH_ID ORDER BY sh_rcmn DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT s.SH_ID, SH_NAME, SH_ADDR, MENU, induty_code_se_name, SH_RCMN, SH_LIKE, SH_PHOTO, MIN(PRICE) AS PRICE FROM store s join store_menu m on s.SH_ID = m.SH_ID group by s.SH_ID ORDER BY SH_LIKE DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM store ORDER BY sh_rcmn DESC LIMIT 6

select s.SH_ID, SH_NAME, SH_ADDR, MENU, induty_code_se_name, SH_RCMN, SH_LIKE, SH_PHOTO, MIN(PRICE) AS PRICE from store s join store_menu m on s.sh_id = m.sh_id where match(s.sh_name,s.sh_addr,s.sh_way,s.sh_pride,m.menu) against(concat('*',#{searchText},'*') IN BOOLEAN MODE) group by sh_id order by sh_rcmn desc;

select s.SH_ID, SH_NAME, SH_ADDR, MENU, induty_code_se_name, SH_RCMN, SH_LIKE, SH_PHOTO, MIN(PRICE) AS PRICE from store s join store_menu m on s.sh_id = m.sh_id
sh_addr like concat('%',#{area},'%') and
sh_addr like '%%' and
induty_code_se_name like concat('%',#{cate},'%')
induty_code_se_name like '%%'
group by sh_id order by sh_rcmn desc;
